Arcanna's Tricks

ADVERTISEMENT
From Diablo Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search

The Arcanna's Tricks Set is designed for a Sorceress, but even with the full set it would only be useful for one early on in the game.


Contents

  • 1 Background
  • 2 Diablo II Item Set
  • 3 Item List
  • 4 Diablo II Classic
  • 5 Media

Background[edit]

As many of the set items found in Diablo II, we do not know much about the origins of this item set.

Diablo II Item Info [e]
1.10
Arcanna's Tricks
[Item Set]
Set Pieces:
Arcanna's Sign
Arcanna's Head
Arcanna's Flesh
Arcanna's Deathwand
  • Two-piece Set Bonus:
    • +25 to Mana
  • Three-piece Set Bonus:
    • +50 to Life
  • Full Set Bonus:
    • 20% Faster Cast Rate
    • 5% Mana Stolen Per Hit
    • +25 to Mana
Slots Used:
  • Head
  • Neck
  • Chest
  • Main Hand
  • Off-Hand
Slots Free:
  • Waist
  • Hands
  • Ring 1
  • Ring 2
  • Feet
Diablo II Item Info [e]
1.10
Arcanna's Tricks (Diablo II)
[Item Set]
Set Pieces:
Arcanna's Sign
Arcanna's Head
Arcanna's Flesh
Arcanna's Deathwand
  • Full Set Bonus:
    • +2 Light Radius
    • Damage Reduced by 3
    • Replenish Life +4
    • Attacker Takes Damage of 2
    • +20% Regenerate Mana
    • +15 to Mana
    • 25% of Deadly Strike*
    • Fastest Cast Rate
    • 5% Mana Stolen Per Hit
    • +25 To Mana
Slots Used:
  • Head
  • Neck
  • Chest
  • Main Hand
  • Off-Hand
Slots Free:
  • Waist
  • Hands
  • Ring 1
  • Ring 2
  • Feet


Diablo II Item Set[edit]

Not a bad set, with a pretty blue color scheme, and a few items of use on their own. Arcanna's total set bonus isn't bad, with the Fastest Cast as well as a decent +mana bonus, but you can easily exceed those bonuses with four good replacement items, so this one has no real long term use, especially since not using a shield is such a good way to get killed.


Item List[edit]

These are the items of set, listed with all their stats. For more information, visit each individual page.

Item Properties Magical Modifiers
Arcanna's Sign

(Amulet)
  • Inv Size: 1x1
  • Required Level: 15
Part of: Arcanna's Tricks
1.10
  • Regenerate Mana 20%
  • +15 to Mana
  • 2 Items: +50% Better Chance of Getting Magical Items
  • 3 Items: +20% Fire Resist
Arcanna's Head

(Skull Cap)
  • Defense: 8-11
  • Durability: 18
  • Inv Size: 2x2
  • Required Strength: 15
  • Required Level: 15
Part of: Arcanna's Tricks
1.10
  • Replenish Life +4
  • Attacker Takes Damage of 2
  • 2 Items: +3 Defense per Clvl
  • 3 Items: +15% Lightning Resist
Arcanna's Flesh

(Light Plate)
  • Defense: 90-107
    • Light Armor
  • Durability: 60
  • Inv Size: 2x3
  • Required Strength: 41
  • Required Level: 15
Part of: Arcanna's Tricks
1.10
  • +2 to Light Radius
  • Damage Reduced by 3
  • 2 Items: +100 Defense
  • 3 Items: +10 Energy
Arcanna's Deathwand

(War Staff)
  • Melee Damage: 12 - 28
  • Weapon Speed: 20
  • Range: 2
  • Damage Bonus: 100 Str
  • Durability: 50
  • Inv Size: 2x3
  • Required Level: 15
Part of: Arcanna's Tricks
1.10
  • 25% Deadly Strike
  • +1 to Sorceress Skills
  • 2 Items: +50 Mana
  • 3 Items: Regenerate Mana 5%
